patthana2.9:9.1: Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:9.2: parāmāsaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.9:10.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:10.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.9:11.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:12.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:12.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā parāmāso ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.9:13.1: Parāmāsañca noparāmāsañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:13.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca parāmāsañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.9:13.6: parāmāse ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.9:16.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.9:21.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:21.2: ahetukaṃ noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.9:21.8: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.9:23.1: Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.9:24.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.9:25.1: Parāmāsañca noparāmāsañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.9:25.2: parāmāsañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.9:28.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.9:30.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … navipāke pañca … pe … nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.9:34.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.9:41.1: Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:41.2: parāmāsaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.9:42.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:42.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.9:42.8: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā), vatthuṃ paccayā noparāmāsā khandhā. #1
patthana2.9:43.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:43.2: noparāmāse khandhe paccayā parāmāso, vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāso. #2
patthana2.9:44.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:44.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā parāmāso ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.9:44.6: vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāso, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.9:45.1: Parāmāsañca noparāmāsañca dhammaṃ paccayā noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:45.2: noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca parāmāsañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.9:45.6: parāmāsañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, parāmāsañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, parāmāsañca vatthuñca paccayā noparāmāsā khandhā.
patthana2.9:48.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.9:52.1: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:52.2: ahetukaṃ noparāmāsaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.9:52.10: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā noparāmāsā khandhā;
patthana2.9:52.11: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.9:55.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.9:59.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.9:63.1: Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.9:63.3: (Evaṃ pañca pañhā kātabbā arūpeyeva, saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi evaṃ kātabbā.)
patthana2.9:68.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:68.2: noparāmāsā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:69.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:70.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:70.2: noparāmāsā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ parāmāsassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:72.1: Parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:72.6: Parāmāsaṃ ārabbha parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.9:73.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:73.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe …
patthana2.9:73.15: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.9:73.16: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:73.25: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe …
patthana2.9:73.32: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.9:73.33: Cetopariyañāṇena noparāmāsacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.9:73.39: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa … pe … noparāmāsā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.9:74.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:74.8: taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.9:74.14: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana2.9:75.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:75.8: taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.9:75.14: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.9:76.1: Parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:76.2: parāmāsañca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha parāmāso uppajjati … tīṇi.
patthana2.9:78.1: Parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:78.2: parāmāsaṃ garuṃ katvā parāmāso uppajjati … tīṇi.
patthana2.9:79.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:79.10: taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.9:79.14: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana2.9:79.18: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe … nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:79.23: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.9:79.25: noparāmāsādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.9:80.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:80.16: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.9:81.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:81.16: vatthuṃ noparāmāse khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.9:81.18: noparāmāsādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ parāmāsassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:82.1: Parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:82.3: parāmāsañca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā parāmāso … tīṇi.
patthana2.9:84.1: Parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:84.2: purimo purimo parāmāso pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:84.4: Purimo purimo parāmāso pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:84.7: Purimo purimo parāmāso pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:85.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:85.2: purimā purimā noparāmāsā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo … pe … anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:85.6: Purimā purimā noparāmāsā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:85.9: Purimā purimā noparāmāsā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:85.10: āvajjanā parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:86.1: Parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:86.2: purimo purimo parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:86.4: Purimo purimo parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:86.5: parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:86.7: Purimo purimo parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa parāmāsassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:88.1: Parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.9:90.1: Parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:91.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:91.32: kāyikassa sukhassa … pe … maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.9:92.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:92.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.9:92.12: saddhā … pe … senāsanaṃ parāmāsassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.9:93.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:93.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.9:93.8: saddhā … pe … senāsanaṃ parāmāsassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:94.1: Parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:94.2: tīṇi upanissayā parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā parāmāsassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.9:96.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:96.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe …
patthana2.9:96.15: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.9:96.23: kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa … pe … vatthu noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.9:97.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:97.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.9:98.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:98.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.9:98.8: vatthu parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:100.1: Parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (pacchājātā kātabbā) … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.9:102.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:102.4: noparāmāsā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.9:102.8: noparāmāsā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:102.12: Noparāmāsā cetanā parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:104.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.9:105.1: Parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:105.2: parāmāsāni maggaṅgāni … pe … (evaṃ pañca pañhā kātabbā) sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.9:107.1: Parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:108.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:109.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:110.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:110.3: vatthu parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.9:111.1: Parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:113.1: Parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:113.4: parāmāso sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.9:113.6: parāmāso purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.9:114.1: Noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:115.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.9:115.6: cakkhuṃ … pe … vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vatthu parāmāsassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.9:116.1: Noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.9:269.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.

patthana2.9:311.14: vatthuṃ parāmaṭṭhe ceva no ca parāmāse khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2

patthana2.9:313.1: (Evaṃ itarepi tīṇi ārabbha kātabbāni. Imaṃ dukaṃ parāmāsadukasadisaṃ. Lokuttaraṃ yahiṃ na labbhati tahiṃ na kātabbaṃ.)
